overview_of_class:
Registration for Performance Studies majors fulfilling production
crew requirements. Students enrolled in PERF_ST 119-0 will perform duties for
run crews and house crews, in connection with productions sponsored by the
Performance Studies Department that take place in the teaching/performance
studio in Annie May Swift Hall. Duty assignments for students enrolled in
PERF_ST 119-0 will be established and periodically reviewed by the faculty of
the Performance Studies Department. The course is non-credit-bearing.

Enrollment is dependent on availability of crew positions for AMS studio
productions. Performance Studies majors must request assignments from Paul
Edwards at: edwdoyle@northwestern.edu

UNITS OF CREDIT. 0 units.
name: Production Laboratory
title: SoC PERF_ST 119-0-20 Production Laboratory

instructors.instructor_addr: Annie May Swift Hall, Room G03
